Frontend

All frontend classes and functions.

Classes and functions for main interface

Main class for creating and handling GUI.

class app_frontend.gui_main.App[source]

Class for handling all GUI frontend.

cmd_conn_wifi()[source]

Calls backend for sending Wi-Fi connect action.

get_config()[source]

Calls backend for getting device config.

get_device_ids()[source]

Calls backend for getting device’s serial info.

get_device_info()[source]

Calls backend for setting full device info.

get_wifi()[source]

Calls backend for getting Wi-Fi config.

identify()[source]

Calls backend for sending identify action.

on_exit()[source]

Called when window is closed.

one_connect(address)[source]

Calls backend for device connect.

one_disconnect(address)[source]

Calls backend for device disconnect.

open_toplevel(string)[source]

Sets waiter window.

redirector(input_str)[source]

Sets text in textbox.

reset()[source]

Calls backend for sending reset action.

set_config(**kwargs)[source]

Calls backend for setting device config.

set_wifi()[source]

Calls backend for setting Wi-Fi config.

start_data()[source]

Calls backend for sending start data action.

stop_data()[source]

Calls backend for sending stop data action.

synchronize()[source]

Calls backend for sending Wi-Fi connect action.

turn_off()[source]

Calls backend for sending turning off action.

Class for creating GUI objects.

class app_frontend.gui_frames.DeviceFrame(master: App)[source]

Create and handle elements of GUI.

btn_connect()[source]

Sets connecting thread for every button.

btn_disconnect()[source]

Sets disconnecting thread for every button.

checkbox_event(btn)[source]

Set function to be called when checkbox state is changed.

connect_threading(button, address)[source]

Calls connecting device and checks checkbox.

create_boxes()[source]

Sets and packs all devices checkboxes.

create_device_frames(master)[source]

Set all GUI elements beside devices checkboxes.

disconnect_threading(button, address)[source]

Calls disconnecting device and unchecks checkbox.

event_start_stop()[source]

Sets threading for starting and stopping data on checkbox.

pack_conf_box()[source]

Pack all GUI elements beside devices checkboxes.

pack_connection_bts()[source]

Pack connect and disconnect buttons.

start_config()[source]

Call parent’s read config and sets config GUI.

unpack_bts()[source]

Destroy all GUI elements.

Updater frontend

class app_frontend.update_toplevel.UpdateWindow(master: App)[source]

GUI and backend for device updater.

full_update()[source]

Calls main steps of update.

go_main()[source]

Closes window and go backs to main window.

on_exit()[source]

Called when window is closed.

pack_all()[source]

Pack all GUI elements.

run_from_main()[source]

Set variables if updater was opened from main window after scan.

scan()[source]

Sets GUI for scanning and connecting device.

send_file()[source]

Calls function to send file/s to configured device.

GUI window for device settings.

Get arguments and call config setting function.

Setting default entries and boxes values.

set_read_values(data)[source]

Setting entries and boxes values from device config.

app_frontend.config_window.reverse_lookup(d, value)[source]

Get dictionary key knowing value only.

GUI class for presenting device ID data.
